entry.string: There are no Newsletter groups. Please click on
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu Noosletter gruoops. Pleese-a cleeck oon

entry.string: You are about to add a user to one of the Newsletter groups. You must select a group that already has the appropriate Newsletter privileges.
entry.translation: Yuoo ere-a ebuoot tu edd a user tu oone-a ooff zee Noosletter gruoops. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Yuoo moost select a gruoop thet elreedy hes zee epprupreeete-a Noosletter preefileges.

entry.string: Newsletter Publisher (AdminNewsletter privilege) - Can create, edit and delete stories, issues, publications and subscriptions. Can set configuration for the information block. Can publish issues.
entry.translation: Noosletter Poobleesher (EdmeenNoosletter preefilege-a) - Cun creete-a, ideet und delete-a stureees, issooes, poobleeceshuns und soobscreepshuns. Cun set cunffeegooreshun fur zee inffurmeshun bluck. Cun poobleesh issooes.

entry.string: NewsletterEditor (DeleteNewsletter privilege) - Can create, edit and delete stories or issues. Cannot publish issues.
entry.translation: NoosletterEdeetur (DeleteNoosletter preefilege-a) - Cun creete-a, ideet und delete-a stureees oor issooes.Cunnut poobleesh issooes. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: NewsletterWriter (AddNewsletter privilege) - Can add, edit or delete stories. Cannot publish issues.
entry.translation: NoosletterVreeter (EddNoosletter preefilege-a) - Cun edd, ideet oor delete-a stureees. Cunnut poobleesh issooes.
